findings.title: Unused function _transfer
findings.description: The _transfer function is declared but not used anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: Undeclared uint size
findings.description: SafeMath library is imported and imposed on uint but not used anywhere.

findings.title: Used locked pragma version
findings.description: The pragma versions used in the contract are not locked. Consider using the latest versions among 0.8.11 for deploying the contracts and libraries as it does not compile for any other version and can be confusing for a developer.

findings.title: Return value of this.transferFrom is not checked
findings.description: The return value of 'this.transferFrom' function call is not being checked, which may lead to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: Missing comments and description
findings.description: The smart contract lacks comments and descriptions, making it difficult to understand its functionality.

findings.title: Unnecessary use of SafeMath
findings.description: SafeMath library is imported and imposed on uint and not used anywhere.
